objectClass.name: Systemdaten
objectClass.description: detailed technical figures of characteristics an capabilities of the system

simpleProperty.name: System name
simpleProperty.description: Recognisable name (product name) of the mobile flood protection system

simpleProperty.name: Stored in place
simpleProperty.description: \"in place system\" (system stored at site protection) or \"out of place system\" (system stored in separate stroage area)

simpleProperty.name: Setup manually
simpleProperty.description: system to be set up \"manually\" or \"automatically\" i.e. by any means of (Antrieb)

simpleProperty.name: Elements combine vertically
simpleProperty.description: necessary hight of protective wall is reached by placing singel elements on top of each other

simpleProperty.name: Elements combine horizontally
simpleProperty.description: necessary length protective wall is reached by placing pane elements one beside the other

vectorSet.name: SpecificSetUpTime
vectorSet.description: Data trippels to describe the setup time, depending on manpower (number of people) an area of protection \"wall\" (square meter)

simpleProperty.name: Setup time for specific setup situation
simpleProperty.description: time needed for setting up a certain area with a certain number of people

simpleProperty.name: Area of protection wall for specific setup situation
simpleProperty.description: area of protection system to be set up in a certain time by a certain number of people

simpleProperty.name: Number of people for specific setup
simpleProperty.description: nummber of people needed to set up a certain area of protection system in a certain time

simpleProperty.name: Length of wall element
simpleProperty.description: Length of one element of proctective pane

simpleProperty.name: Higth of wall element
simpleProperty.description: Hight of one element of proctective pane

simpleProperty.name: Width of wall element
simpleProperty.description: Width of one element of proctective pane

simpleProperty.name: Mass of wall element
simpleProperty.description: Mass of one element of proctective pane

simpleProperty.name: Field length of system
simpleProperty.description: Lenth of one field of protective wall (including post and pane)

simpleProperty.name: Specific mass of post element
simpleProperty.description: Specific mass of one post element in mass per meter

simpleProperty.name: Length fector of post element
simpleProperty.description: Factor describing the total lenth of a post element as multiple of length above surface (f.e. 1.33 for one third of length below surface)

simpleProperty.name: Specific storage space
simpleProperty.description: Necessary storage space as cubic meter ver square meter
